meaningMnemonic: What is a <kanji>sprout</kanji> doing? It's <vocabulary>sprouting</vocabulary> and <vocabulary>budding</vocabulary>. A <vocabulary>crush</vocabulary> you have on someone can sprout too.
readingMnemonic:
Since this word consists of a kanji with hiragana attached, you can bet that it will use the kun'yomi reading. You didn't learn that reading with this kanji, so here's a mnemonic to help you: 

Think about that newly <vocabulary>sprouting</vocabulary> <reading>moe</reading> (もえ) character you have a crush on. Yes, this is the same moe. Congrats, you already know it!
